value.name: What’s Happening: Local events for May 21-27
value.description: Softball, food, inflatables for kids and music. On Friday: ballgames start at 7 p.m. on three diamonds; music by Nick Hamilton, one-man band. On Saturday: more ballgames, music by DJ at night.
